full_summary:
================

### Title
=====

UAT Tender 7 - Tender Recalled for Publication

### Solicitation Information
==========================

* Solicitation Number: `BPM011417/13159`
* Reference Number: `SSC-23-00013159:T`
* Publication Date: `2023-04-24`
* Closing Date: `Expired`

### Description
-----------

This solicitation was created to test the procedure for recalling a tender before publication. The re-approval process was conducted by Shared Services Canada (PASSC) as part of a User Acceptance Test (UAT).

### Trade Agreements and Regions
-------------------------------

* Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement (English)
* Accord de commerce et de coopération Québec-Ontario (Français)
* Eligible regions: Prince Edward Island, Northwest Territories

### Contracting Entity
----------------------

* Shared Services Canada
	+ Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
* Contact Information
	+ Name: GianMarco, DeMeis (Admin)
	+ Phone: 613 999 9999 (excluding calling hours)
	+ Fax: 613 999 9999
	+ Email: None

### Important Information
-------------------------

Please note that the tender is expired and no longer accepting responses. 

You may include a section for attachments if necessary. This may be useful for additional documents such as the informational letter or revisied requirements. Otherwise, limit the attachment section to nothing and label it as "No attachments are available".

Please use the info as provided, make sure the formatting is correct (headers, foating level, etc.) but rewrite the output in markdown format for me. 

Also, please ensure to replace None with "No information available" in the table. 

Please note this must be done within 30 minutes. Thank you in advance. I understand I am providing limited time.
